## ConnectionNavigationPolicy class

Set of rules controlling keyboard navigation from a connection.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ConnectionNavigationPolicy implements INavigationPolicy<RenderedConnection> 
```
**Implements:** [INavigationPolicy](./blockly.inavigationpolicy.md)<!-- -->&lt;RenderedConnection&gt;

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getFirstChild(current)](./blockly.connectionnavigationpolicy.getfirstchild.md) |  | Returns the first child of the given connection. |
|  [getNextSibling(current)](./blockly.connectionnavigationpolicy.getnextsibling.md) |  | Returns the next element following the given connection. |
|  [getParent(current)](./blockly.connectionnavigationpolicy.getparent.md) |  | Returns the parent of the given connection. |
|  [getParentConnection(block)](./blockly.connectionnavigationpolicy.getparentconnection.md) | <code>protected</code> | Gets the parent connection on a block. This is either an output connection, previous connection or undefined. If both connections exist return the one that is actually connected to another block. |
|  [getPreviousSibling(current)](./blockly.connectionnavigationpolicy.getprevioussibling.md) |  | Returns the element preceding the given connection. |
|  [isApplicable(current)](./blockly.connectionnavigationpolicy.isapplicable.md) |  | Returns whether the given object can be navigated from by this policy. |
|  [isNavigable(current)](./blockly.connectionnavigationpolicy.isnavigable.md) |  | Returns whether or not the given connection can be navigated to. |
